mapper.insert: insert into buy (BUYID, BUYCOUNT, BUYTIME, PROVID, DEPARTID) values (#{buyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buycount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select BUYID, BUYCOUNT, BUYTIME, PROVID, DEPARTID from buy
